trends: There have been 17 other sightings in Huntsville
There were no other sightings in Huntsville on or around June 15th 1997
Summary: BUBBLE LIKE CRAFT 25 FT ABOVE CATTLE IN FIELD
divs: Sighting DetailsI WASCOMMING HOME FROM WORK AS A ASSISTANT MANAGER OF FREDS DISCOUNT STORE AS I WAS JUST OUTSIDE OF TOWN SOMETHING ABOVE SOME CATTLE IN A FIELD CAUGHT MY ATTENTION IT WAS A BUBBLE LIKE CRAFT MOVEING SLOWLY ACROSS A FIELD OVER TO THE LEFT OF MY CAR IT WAS DISTORTING THE AREAS AS IT MOVED BUT WAS ALMOST LIKE IT WASNT EVEN THERE KINDA LIKE THE ALIEN IN THE MOVIE PREDITOR IT WAS GLASS LIKE AND I FIRST THOUGHT I WAS PICKING UP A REFLECTION ON MY SIDE WINDOW SO I QUICKLY ROLLED DOWN THE WINDOW BUT THE OBJECT REMAINED I WAS IN TRAFFIC BUT TO MY KNOWLEDGE I WAS THE ONLY PERSON WHOM SAW IT THERE WERE NO WINDOWS OR LIGHTS OF ANY KIND NOT EVEN A DOOR IT MOVED SLOWLY ACROSS THE FIELD STARTED MOVING KINDA ERATICACLY THEN WENT STREIGHT UP AND OUT OF SIGHT LIKE IN 2 SECONDS WAS OUT OF SIGHT WAS A CLEAR DAY NOT A CLOUD IN THE SKY I WAS NOT ON ANY TYPE DRUG WAS NOT IN ANY TYPE DISTRESS AND I LATER WENT TO NURSING SCHOOL AND BECAME A NURSE I HAVE SEEN 2 IN MY LIFETIME ONE WHEN I WAS ABOUT 10M BUT IT HAD LIGHTS AND WAS DISK LIKE THIS THING HAD SOME TYPE CLOAKING DEVICE THAT WAS PROJECTING THE STUFF BEHIND IT TO THE FROUNT AS IF IT WASNT EVEN THERE I HAVE TRIED SINCE 1997 TO REPORT THIS TO THE MILITARY BUT NOBODY WILL RETURN MY EMAILS I AM NOT A NUT I THINK THAT MAYBE THIS IS WHY PEOPLE ARE NOT SEEING THEM AS MUCH MOST OF THEM HAVE THIS NEW TECHNOLOGY AND ARE PRACTALLY INVISABLE I SAW NO PEOPLE OR ALIENS OR ANYTHING IN OR AROUND THE CRAFT ALSO I NOTED THAT THE CATTLE APROX 75 HEAD CONTINUED TO GRAZE AND DIDNT LOOK AS IF THEY NOTICED OR WAS AWARE OF THE CRAFT I STOPPED MY CAR IN TRAFFIC AND WATCHED IT TILL IT SHOT STREIGHT UP AND OUT OF SIGHT IT DIDNT AFFECT MY CAR OR ANYONE ELSE IN TRAFFIC AS I COULD TELL AND I DROVE ON HOME TRYING TO FIGURE OUT WHAT I HAD SEEN AND AS I FIRST SAW IT I KNEW THAT BY NOT MAKING ANY SOUND OR WIND AND THE SPEED IT WENT STREIGHT UP IT WAS NOT FROM OUR WORLD AFTER THAT I NEVER SAW IT AGAIN NOR HAVE I SEEN ANYTHING LIKE IT SINCE THAT DAY PEOPLE CAN BELIEVE ME OR NOT BUT THE FACT REMAINS THAT EITHER OUR GOVERMENT HAVE SOME TECHNOLOGY WE DONT KNOW ABOUT OR WE ARE BEING VISITED FROM SOMEWHERE OUT THERE AND WE ARE GETTING OUT ADVANCES IN TECHNOLOOGY FROM OUT THERE THIS IS A FACTUAL EVENT AND I HAVE GAINED NOTHING FROM TELLING WHAT I SAW BUT I REALLY DID SEE SOMETHING THAT I TRULY BELIEVE IS NOT FROM OUR WORLD
